cameraoverhaul.config.title: CameraOverhaul Settings
cameraoverhaul.config.enabled.name: Enable the mod's effects
cameraoverhaul.config.enabled.tooltip: Toggles all of the mod's features.
cameraoverhaul.config.strafingrollfactor: Controls the strength of the camera roll rotation caused by strafing, or sideway horizontal velocity.
Strafing Roll Factor When Elytra Flying
Controls the strength of the camera roll rotation when flying with an elytra
Controls the strength of the camera roll rotation when swimming
cameraoverhaul.config.turningrollaccumul: Controls the sensitivity of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.turningrollintensi: Controls the maximum strength of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.turningrollsmoothi: Controls the decay smoothness of the camera roll rotation caused by turning around horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.verticalvelocitypi: Controls the strength of the camera pitch rotation offset caused by vertical velocity.
cameraoverhaul.config.forwardvelocitypit: Controls the strength of the camera pitch rotation offset caused by moving forward or backwards.
cameraoverhaul.config.horizontalvelocity: Controls the smoothness of camera pitch & roll rotations caused by moving horizontally.
cameraoverhaul.config.verticalvelocitysm: Controls the smoothness of camera pitch rotations caused by moving vertically.
